sentence: Analysts at Jefferies & Co. on Wednesday made a big negative call on the bulk of the retail sector.

The firm said it cut its ratings from "Buy" to "Hold" on the following stocks:

The firm also cut its rating on a number of other retailers as well, citing a worsening macroeconomic environment.
Shares of Target ( TGT ) have a 2.45% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $48.95.
Shares of Costco ( COST ) have a 1.29% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $74.66.
Shares of Kohl's ( KSS ) have a 2.15% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $46.56.
Shares of Home Depot ( HD ) have a 3.32% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $30.15.
